Html:
I run a cronjob and it generates however many excel files as needs be for that month. Everything works fine and the files are created, but styles are not initiated on any file apart from the first one.

It still merges files and puts breaks in, column widths and the images, but the font size, text align and borders are not.

Is there a way I can clear all the styles used after it saves each sheet and then reinitiate them at the beginning of the next file, or should I use the shard style system?

 

Ta, Ian
Sorted it now. Search for something completely different and found oiut I should download the snapashot as the engine has been updated. Done it and it works perfectly now :)
